column1: Cafe Ba-Ba-Reeba!////My roommates and I go here a couple times a year and have always enjoyed it.  It's typical tapas
column2: so you can find some classic favorites (and the patatas bravas and bacon wrapped dates are as good as expected)
column3: as well as some interesting new flavors (I'm a sucker for their shishito peppers).  And you simply can't go without having dessert - they offer really small desserts
column4: so you can get a couple
column5: but the butterscotch pudding is one of the most delicious things I've ever put in my mouth.  Even if you don't think you like butterscotch
column6: it's worth trying it - it came recommended to me and was better than I could have imagined!  Sangria is only ok
column7: but a couple glasses in and you won't mind so much.
